overview:
Peter Schurman was the founding Executive Director (CEO) at MoveOn.org, from 2001-2005, where he worked closely with some of the brightest minds in online marketing, to scale the organization’s user base by a factor of 8, from 350,000 to more than 3 million members, to grow its annual revenues by a factor of 80, from $81,000, to $6.5 million, and to drive total revenues of $14 million over his four years there.

While there he acquired a deep understanding of how to build friction-free user experiences around compelling online offers.

Since leaving MoveOn, he has pursued a variety of entrepreneurial ventures in the consumer internet space, and consulted independently to numerous startups and nonprofit organizations, helping them apply best practices in online marketing.

He is thrilled about his current role as head of marketing and user experience at Blipboard.

Peter grew up in Portland, Maine and has lived mostly in the Bay area since 1996.
